description:
[b]Official WalletConnect plugin for Bubble made by NovaBloq in collaboration with the WalletConnect team[/b]

WalletConnect is built into more than 75 leading Web3 wallets such as TrustSwap, Cryptocom, Ledger Live, 1inch Wallet, MetaMask etc.

# Features:
- Integrated customizable UI
- Connect/Disconnect a wallet
- Sign a message
- Get signed Signature
- Events like chain changed, account changed, etc.
- Auto-adjust UI for mobile use
Supports any chain like Ethereum, Polygon, BSC, Arbitrum etc.

Demo:
https://walletconnect-official.bubbleapps.io/version-test/conf_demo

[b]Video instruction:[/b]
https://youtu.be/SG_9dEsxwr8

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Join the Web3 NoCode community on Discord:[/b] https://discord.gg/SwfQHfaseu
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
name: WalletConnect Official
plugin_instructions:
# Installation
Add the plugin element on the page. Make sure it is on the page itself and not inside a group. If the group will be hidden (collapsed) the plugin won't run.

Get a Project ID key
Go to cloud.walletconnect.com
Insert the key in plugin settings
